entry.content:

entry.title: [GLOBAL][Collaborative solutions] - MX Plan incident notification
entry.content:
Oct 9, 14:22 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our MX Plan offering has been resolved.

Start time : 09/10/2025 07:40 UTC
End time : 09/10/2025 14:05 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a software issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Oct 9, 08:34 UTC
Monitoring - Service has been fully restored since 09/10/2025 08:28 UTC. Monitoring remains active to ensure long-term stability.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 09/10/2025 07:40 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : MX Plan Webmail service was temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers were temporarily experiencing difficulties accessing their mailboxes.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Oct 9, 07:56 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our MX Plan offering.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 09/10/2025 07:40 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : MX Plan Webmail service is currently unavailable.
Customers Impact : Affected customers may experience difficulties accessing their mailboxes.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a software issue.
Workaround : Customers can access their mailbox via IMAP/POP.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA][Collaborative solutions] - Webmail filerz19 incident notification
entry.content:
Oct 9, 01:01 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Collaborative solutions has been resolved.

Start time : 09/10/2025 19:30 UTC
End time : 09/10/2025 00:49 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a hardware issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Oct 9, 00:56 UTC
Monitoring - Service has been fully restored since 08/10/2025 00:49 UTC. Monitoring remains active to ensure long-term stability.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 09/10/2025 19:30 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : The MX Plan service was temporarily unavailable on Filerz 19.
Customers Impact : Customers were temporarily unable to access webmail via the web interface or desktop client. Emails sent or received are temporarily unavailable and will be delivered once the incident is resolved.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Oct 8, 22:55 UTC
Identified - [GRA][Collaborative solutions] - Webmail filerz19 incident notification

We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Collaborative solutions offer, which is causing temporary availability issue in the GRA region.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 08/10/2025 19:30 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : The MX Plan service is temporarily unavailable on Filerz 19.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access webmail via the web interface or desktop client. Emails sent or received are temporarily unavailable and will be delivered once the incident is resolved.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Oct 8, 19:56 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating an incident affecting our Collaborative solutions offering, which is causing temporary availability issue in the GRA region.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 08/10/2025 19:30 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : The MX Plan service is temporarily unavailable on Filerz 19.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access webmail via the web interface or desktop client. Emails sent or received are temporarily unavailable and will be delivered once the incident is resolved.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA1/2][Web Hosting] - Multiple Filerz maintenance notification
entry.content:
Oct 8, 00:19 UTC
Completed - We would like to inform you that the maintenance on our is now completed.

Oct 7, 21:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 6, 21:39 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our responsibilities for Web Hosting filerz, we will be performing infrastructure maintenance.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 07/10/2025 21:00 UTC
End time : 08/10/2025 04:00 UTC
Service impact : Concerned Filerz will be temporarily unavailable for 40 minutes during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be performing an update for the storage servers hosting your data.
This version brings improvements to certain security mechanisms, as well as some performance enhancements.

List of concerned Filerz:

- filerz481: Cluster102
- filerz580: Cluster014
- filerz638: Cluster010
- filerz158: Cluster026
- filerz41: Cluster022

Thank you for your understanding.
